ValidationRule.description: Associated account must must have the Naming Rights picklist populated before moving to Closed Won
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
Account.RecordType.DeveloperName = "Customer",
ISCHANGED (StageName),
ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won"),
ISPICKVAL( Account.Naming_Rights__c,"") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Naming Rights on the Account must be selected.
